title: Arshad Nadeem’s historic victory testament to hardwork, dedication: Shaza Fatima
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 09 (APP): Minister of State for IT and Telecommunication Shaza Fatima Khawaja presented heartiest congratulations to Pakistani athlete Arshad Nadeem on his phenomenal achievement at the Paris Olympics.
“His historic gold medal and Olympic record is a testament to his hard work, dedication, and the limitless potential of our nation’s youth. Under the leadership of Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif, the Government of Pakistan has consistently supported our athletes, as evidenced by the strong backing during the Commonwealth Games and Islamic Solidarity Games in 2022. “, she said in a statement here Friday.
This year June, Arshad received significant financial support from the government for his medical treatments and surgery in UK through the federation, along with a financial reward for his silver medal win at the World Athletics Championships in 2023, she added.
This unwavering support of Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif continues today and will persist in the future, ensuring that our sportsmen and women have the resources they need to excel on the world stage, Pakistan Zindabad!, she added.
